title: [Massive] Integrated QIPS Leadership Competency Development Program for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in healthcare system operations and management, along with basic medical administrative knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasizes the capacity to design and operate QIPS systems applicable immediately in practical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply QIPS core principles (PDCA cycle, root cause analysis, etc.) with 80% accuracy through real medical case analysis
Learners can design a three-stage QIPS implementation roadmap tailored to institutional characteristics and submit a second revised version incorporating peer feedback
Learners can propose improvement measures for at least three real medical error cases and conduct feasibility evaluations using a digital learning platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
